WorkItem.Description:
The new Identity system incorporated in MVC5 seems to be (at last) truly modular and customizable.

Could you provide samples about implementations using an storage other than the EF/SqlServer, as you done with the infamous "Implementing a custom Membership/Role/Profile provider" in the previous membership system?

Another option is that you expose the code of the EF/SqlServer implementation of the identity system, so we can examine it and reimplement using different storage options (i.e. NoSql)

Thanks in advance
WorkItem.Summary: MVC 5 new Identity system using different storage than EF/SqlServer
